data: ECHO-GL Liu et al. (2024a)
Heterogeneous graph learning based on earnings conference call data
Two-mechanism approach combining spatial relationships with stock dynamics
MGDPR You et al. (2024)
Modeling dynamic relationships using information entropy
Multi-relational diffusion process with parallel retention
Stable superiority on NASDAQ, NYSE, Shanghai (2016-2023)
LARA Zeng et al. (2024)
Two-stage noise reduction framework considering locality
Iterative label refinement for noise reduction
Accuracy: 59.1%. Improved win/loss ratio in volatile markets
MANA-Net Wang and Ma (2024)
Dynamic attention mechanism for market news
Trainable sentiment aggregation optimized for forecasting
SH-Mix Jain et al. (2024)
Hierarchical multimodal augmentation strategy
Mixing methods, modality-specific and segment-based
Performance improvement: 3-7% across all tasks
SEP Koa et al. (2024a)
Self-reflective LLM framework for autonomous learning
Three-stage pipeline with PPO optimization
Superior performance both in forecasting and as explanations
